meanings.sent1: The stars in the sky are uncountable.
meanings.sent2: There are uncountable grains of sand on the beach.
meanings.sent3: The uncountable number of balloons filled the room to the brim.
meanings.sent4: Her uncountable laughter filled the air with joy.
meanings.sent5: The uncountable amount of books in the library overwhelmed the visitors.

meanings.sent1: The sugar in this jar is uncountable.
meanings.sent2: The happiness she felt was uncountable.
meanings.sent3: The uncountable raindrops danced on the roof all night.
meanings.sent4: His uncountable kindness touched everyone around him.
meanings.sent5: The uncountable stars in the night sky twinkled brightly.
